Description.Name: Command Console
Description.Details: Allows you to Command an Additional Mechwarrior Directly The Command and Control systems were never really intended to support a Light Company’s worth of ‘Mechs, Commander. If we want to maintain communications with our pilots, we’ll need to upgrade our communication networks to deal with the additional bandwidth.

AssignedCastDescription: Improving the network linkages between our C&C systems should ease some of the burden
